constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作次数限制，最多只能建造 10^4 次探测仪

constraints.name: size_bound
constraints.description: 探测仪的边长必须在 [0.01, 200] 米之间

constraints.name: precision_bound
constraints.description: 探测仪摆放位置的精度必须精确到 10^-5 米

constraints.name: coverage_constraint
constraints.description: 探测仪至少要有一个顶点在矿区内部
constraints.formal: exists vertex in rectangle such that 0 <= x_vertex <= 99 and 0 <= y_vertex <= 99

constraints.name: rectangle_constraint
constraints.description: 探测仪的四个顶点必须构成一个矩形
constraints.formal: vertices A, B, C, D form a rectangle
